definition: to meet with disaster/killed/in the clutches of the enemy/to fall foul of/in danger
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: The national hero, Zhang Huangyan s deeds have definite historical records.
sentences.chinese: 民族英雄張煌言蒙難南田事蹟，史志早有記載。

sentences.english: These are our nights of Gethsemane.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我們的蒙難之夜。
